column2: OTE: The following 16 variables refer to any use of prescription drugs. Any Use of prescription drugs is defined as either the use of one's own
prescription medication as directed by a doctor or the misuse of prescription drugs. Misuse of prescription drugs is defined as use in any way not
directed by a doctor, including use without a prescription of one's own medication; use in greater amounts, more often, or longer than told to take a

column1: drug; or use in any other way not directed by a doctor.
